import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update inventory items by query"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/items/query/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates multiple inventory catalog items matching a query filter with the same update values.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0).

**Use Case**: Useful for bulk updates like changing category for all items matching a keyword, or updating cost across multiple items.

**Workflow**:
1. Build a query filter (e.g., by keyword or category)
2. Preview matching items using [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/items/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-items)
3. Prepare the update object with new values
4. Submit the query-based update request

**Updatable Fields**: `Name`, `CategoryId`, `Description`, `AverageCost`, `MinQuantityAvailable`, `MaxQuantityAvailable`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

updating inventory items by query filter.","properties":{"Update":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an inventory catalog item."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product scope identifier."},"CategoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Category identifier."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the item."},"ItemNumber":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Internal part number or SKU."},"ImageId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the item's image file."},"TrackSupplier":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to track supplier for this item."},"TrackUnits":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to track units for this item."},"QuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","description":"Total quantity available."},"AverageCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Average unit cost."},"UseFixedCost":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to use fixed cost will be updated."},"CustomFieldValues":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Custom field values to set.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Custom field value for an inventory facets.","items":{"type":"string"}},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Single-value fallback used by certain legacy facets."}},"required":["Facet"],"title":"InventoryRequestFilter"},{"type":"object","properties":{"Facet":{"allOf":[{"type":"string","description":"Facet keys returned by the filter service for entity type `75a1a773-e4ac-46ab-9f53-d3f6c4aa073b`, which powers parts and consumables catalog searches in Incident IQ. Call `/api/v1.0/filters/for/entitytype/{entityTypeId}` to retrieve additional keys when new filters are introduced.","enum":["customfieldaddress","customfieldassets","customfieldchangerequests","customfieldconfirmationmessage","customfielddate","customfielddaterange","customfielddatetime","customfielddetailssection","customfieldemailmessage","customfieldinformation","customfieldipaddress","customfieldlocations","customfieldmultilinetext","customfieldmultiselect","customfieldnumber","customfieldnumberrange","customfieldphone","customfieldprotectedinfo","customfieldrichtext","customfieldscheduleselector","customfieldselect","customfieldtext","customfieldusers","customfieldyesno","inventoryitem","inventoryitemcategory","inventoryitemname","inventoryitemnumber","keyword","location","qty"],"example":"inventoryitem","title":"PartSearchFacetKey"}],"description":"Facet key accepted by the parts catalog (for example, `inventoryitem`, `inventoryitemcategory`, or `qty`)."}}}],"title":"InventoryItemRequestFilter"},"description":"Array of filters to identify items to update."},"Fields":{"type":"array","description":"Optional projection list.","items":{"type":"string"}}},"required":["Update"],"title":"UpdateInventoryItemsRequest"},"example":{"Filters":[{"Facet":"keyword","Values":["chromebook"]}],"Update":{"MinQuantityAvailable":30}}}}}}
